core / FixOf

FixOf

data class FixOf

A FixOf identifies the question side of a fix: what day, tenor and type of fix ("LIBOR", "EURIBOR" etc)



Constructors

<init> FixOf(name: String, forDay: LocalDate, ofTenor: Duration)

A FixOf identifies the question side of a fix: what day, tenor and type of fix ("LIBOR", "EURIBOR" etc)
